original_body_lines: Flexiprint team led by Managing Director Sathis Abeywickrama receiving the award from National Chamber of Commerce Deputy President Kavinda Rajapaksa

Flexiprint Ltd., a leader in the packaging industry of Sri Lanka, bagged the Merit Award in the Printing and Related Services Sector at the National Business Excellence Awards 2022 organised by the Ceylon National Chamber of Commerce.
The Flexiprint team including its Managing Director Sathis Abeywickrama received the award from NCCSL Deputy President Kavinda Rajapaksa at a ceremony held at the Shangri-La Hotel in Colombo.

Widely known for its premium quality tea bag tags and tea bag covers for both local and international tea markets, Flexiprint was the first packaging company in Sri Lanka to manufacture premium tea packaging using Flexography technology and ink mixed with water (Water Base).

Flexiprint, which was inaugurated in 1994 with one machine and 10 employees, is now a well-known company with eight machines and nearly 275 employees. It has excellent technical know-how to deliver any order at any scale on time. Flexiprint’s product portfolio includes a variety of tea packaging including tea bag tags, tea bag covers and pyramid-shaped tea covers.

“Continuous recognition at the National Business Excellence Awards is a prime example of our excellent products and services. We work in a business sector that brings significant foreign exchange revenue to Sri Lanka, and we will continue to conquer the local and international markets with excellent products. On this occasion, I would like to offer my gratitude to our dedicated staff who immensely contributed to this achievement,” said Flexiprint Managing Director Sathis Abeywickrama.
